author: stagus
title: Nice small jet
review:
I picked tis up on eBay as it is a promotional set.  It's a nice small set with a couple of minifigs, the pilot and a passenger.  There is nothing exceptional about it.  What I do like about it is the size.  It is like a private jet in scale to the huge planes that you get with the airport sets.  Pick one up if you get the chance particularly if you are an 'airport' collector.

Pros

  • Size
  • Easy build

Cons

  • Can't be bought in the shops.
  • â€¦

Fun and simple....if you are flying with the airline selling this set then pick it up.  I am sure the kids will love it.
